static getInstance ()

Detailed Description

Buffer Singleton class, provides the ability to save variables. Used in the Plugin system of Hygia to be able to construct flows.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

Here is the caller graph for this function:

Buffer.set ( $  vName,
$  sValue = null 
)

Set a variable. This can be done in three ways:

  • supply one single string value, which will be saved in an indexed array
  • supply one single associative array of name/value pairs
  • supply a name and a value, both strings
    Parameters:
    $vName mixed Is either a value, an associative array of variables or the name-component of a variable
    $sValue string The value (optional in case of set)
    Since:
    1.0
